dct_title_s: L'AMERIQUE SEPTENTRIONALE. Dress√©e sur les Observations de Mrs. de l' Academie Royale des Sciences & quelques autres, & sur les Memoires les plus recens
dct_description_sm: California as peninsula; west coast extended north to C. Mendocin.
Engraved by: N. Guerard (below title cartouche).
Title cartouche with mythological gods (upper right).
Multiple scales within scrollwork cartouche, and 'Avertissement' below (upper left).
Numerous voyages in Pacific are shown.
Reissued by P. Mortier c1705, by P. Schenck in 1708, and by T.C. Lotter c1708 with some names latinized or omitted.
Par G. de l'Isle Prem. Geographe du Roy.
